attr.title: Bushido Panda
attr.desc: The Kingdom of Japanda is in great danger! The pig army from the Land Of Darkness has seized control over the five elemental crystals, plunging the world into chaos! Take up your katana and fight back in this grand 8-bit adventure! Will you be able to save Japanda from ruin?
attr.inst: Download the BushidoPanda_v1_1b.zip from Itch.io and place it into assets folder.
attr.inst_md: Download the `BushidoPanda_v1_1b.zip` from [Itch.io](https://yaru.itch.io/bushido-panda) and place it into `assets` folder.
